content: It seems that whenever Trump gets uncomfortable, he’s got a couple of go-tos. First, the “but…but…but…HILLARY!” routine, or some variation thereof. Second, the “Democrats (or the media) are still mad about my landslide victory” song and dance number (I’m not even going to get into what a lie that is). Both routines have gotten stale, but they’re all he has. His early morning tweets are just this sort of fluff. The main thing we need to remember is when you watch an illusionist, don’t get mesmerized by the hand that’s waving about flamboyantly. Keep an eye on the hand in the pocket. And when Trump starts throwing out a lot of distractions, it’s time to pay attention to his hand in his pocket.
